parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark message(s) as read when fetched

messages.content:
You will be given description about a task which is extracted from an email written by a human. Your job is to evaluate the task by look analysing it based on the following parameters:
Start Date, Due date, Priority, Time Estimate
Your response must be in JSON.

Hi Emily,Could you create a content calendar for our social media channels for the month of November? We’d like to focus on promoting our upcoming product launch and seasonal promotions.Start Date: October 28, 2024Due Date: October 31, 2024Priority: HighTime Estimate: 3 hoursPlease include post ideas, themes, and suggested dates for each platform. Let me know if you need any additional resources or insights.Thanks for taking care of this!Best,[Your Name]
